message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a method for lifelong learning that utilizes high-level task descriptions to model inter-task relationships and improve performance. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), robotics (cs.RO), and natural language processing (cs.CL), as these are all areas where lifelong learning and transfer learning are relevant topics. Among these, cs.LG is the most likely category as the paper focuses on developing a lifelong learning method.
